resource:
1001131.1000851.1000859.description=Add more aggressive driving performance. PLUS Package includes:
• Unique PLUS badge and carpet floor mats with the Prius PLUS logo
• Sporty 17-in. split-spoke forged wheels with a liquid-metal finish
• Ground effects kit with front air dam plus additional ground effects components
• PLUS lowering springs designed to help enhance on-road performance
• PLUS rear sway bar designed to help provide for flatter cornering
• PLUS 17-in. split-spoke forged wheels, ground effects kit and rear sway bar available individually

To avoid potential interference with pedal operation, do not install a floor mat on top of an existing floor mat, and each mat must be secured with either quarter-turn fasteners or retention hooks (clips). This floor mat was designed specifically for use in this model and model year vehicle and SHOULD NOT be used in any other vehicle.

17- in. performance tires are often expected to experience greater tire wear than conventional tires. Tire life may be substantially less than 24,000 miles depending upon tires used and driving conditions.

PLUS lowering springs, PLUS sway bar, PLUS badge and PLUS carpet floor mats are available only with the Prius PLUS Performance Package. 1001131.1002622.1000859.1000877.title=PLUS Performance Package [installed_msrp] 1001131.1000851.1000859.1000875.alacarte=false 1001131.1000851.1000859.1000877.derived=false 1001131.1002622.1000859.1000878.group=Performance 1001131.1000851.1000859.1000875.package=true 1001131.1000851.1000859.1000876.package=true 1001131.1002622.1000859.1000876.description=Add more aggressive driving performance with the PLUS Performance Package.
• PLUS rear sway bar designed to help provide for flatter cornering
• PLUS lowering springs designed to help enhance on-road performance
• Sporty PLUS 17-in. split 5-spoke forged wheels with a liquid-metal finish
• Unique PLUS badge and carpet floor mats with the Prius PLUS logo
• Ground effects kit with front air dam plus additional ground effects components
• PLUS 17-in. split 5-spoke forged wheels, lowering springs, ground effects kit and rear sway bar available individually

This floor mat was designed specifically for use in your model and model year vehicle and SHOULD NOT be used in any other vehicle. To avoid potential interference with pedal operation, each mat must be secured with its fasteners. Do not install a floor mat on top of an existing floor mat.

PLUS badge and PLUS carpet floor mats are available only with the Prius PLUS Performance Package.

17-in. performance tires are expected to experience greater tire wear than conventional tires.
